name.description: The name of the course category

id.description: The id of the course category

imagePath.description: The image path of the course

description.description: The complete description of the course

shortDescription.description: A brief description of the course

location.description: Location where the course will be held

instructors.description: List of instructors for the course

isPublished.description: Indicates if the course is public

maxSubscribers.description: Amount of maximum subscribers (unlimited if null)
